property.name: arYbsYardBlockId

property.name: arYbsYardBlockType
property.meta: Block type (Stack/ Heap)

property.name: arYbsUsedSlots

property.name: arYbsUsableReeferSlots

property.name: arYbsUsedReeferSlots

property.name: arYbsPlannedSlots
property.meta: Planned teus for a heap block.

property.name: arYbsAreaCode

property.meta: Yard Block ID

property.name: arYtsYardBlockType
property.meta: Block type (Stack/ Heap)

property.name: arYtsTimeExtracted

property.name: arYtsTierId

property.name: arYtsTotalSlots

property.name: arYtsUsedSlots

property.name: arYtsUsableSlots

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveVesselCraneStatistics
class.meta: Records a snapshot of the current state of crane's operation for the vessel visit

property.name: arVcsCarrierGkey
property.meta: Gkey of vcsCarrier

property.name: arVcsCarrierId
property.meta: The CarrierVisit cvId corresponding to this CarrierVisit

property.name: arVcsPlannedCompletion
property.meta: Latest Planned completion for this crane.

property.name: arVcsEstimatedCompletion
property.meta: Latest Estimated completion for this crane.

property.name: arVcsMovesToGo
property.meta: Number of moves to go for this crane.

property.name: arVcsBaysWorked
property.meta: Count of bays worked by this crane.

property.name: arVcsSequence
property.meta: Sequence in which this crane is scheduled for the given Vessel.

property.name: arVcsUpdateTime
property.meta: UTC timestamp at which this record was updated.

property.name: arVcsIsValid
property.meta: A flag that specifies if this object is currently valid or not.

property.name: arVcsMultiSegment
property.meta: A flag that specifies if this ocrane has multiple segments or not.

property.name: arVcsMovesCompleted
property.meta: Number of moves completed by this crane on this vessel.

property.name: arVcsMovesLastHour
property.meta: Number of moves completed by this crane on this vessel in last 60 minutes.

property.name: arVcsFirstMoveTime
property.meta: First move time for the crane.

property.name: arVcsLastMoveTime
property.meta: Last move time for the crane.

property.name: arVcsFirstActivityTime
property.meta: First activity time for the crane.

property.name: arVcsLastActivityTime
property.meta: Last activity time for the crane.

property.name: arVcsFinalMovesToGo
property.meta: Final moves to go for the crane.

property.name: arVcsFinalETC
property.meta: Final etc for the crane.

property.name: arVcsFinalMovesCompleted
property.meta: Final moves completed for the crane.

property.name: arVcsTerminalDelay
property.meta: Terminal delay for the crane.

property.name: arVcsNonTerminalDelay
property.meta: Non terminal delay for the crane.

property.name: arVcsForceMajeureDelay
property.meta: Force Majeure delay for the crane.

property.name: arVcsTotalDelay
property.meta: Total delay for the crane.

property.name: arVcsEffectiveGrossGangHour
property.meta: Effective gross gang hour for the crane.

property.name: arVcsSingleLoadCount
property.meta: Total number of single loads done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsSingleDischargeCount
property.meta: Total number of single discharges done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsSingleShobCount
property.meta: Total number of single SHOB moves done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsTwinLoadCount
property.meta: Total number of twin loads done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsTwinDischargeCount
property.meta: Total number of twin discharges done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsTwinShobCount
property.meta: Total number of twin SHOB moves done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsBreakBulkMoves
property.meta: Total number of break bulk moves done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsHatchLidMoves
property.meta: Total number of hatch lid moves done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsTwistLockMoves
property.meta: Total number of twist lock moves done by this crane.

property.name: arVcsEgearMoves
property.meta: Total number of egear moves done by this crane.

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveMoveRecord
class.meta: create index ar_mvrc_to_arr_pos_anchor_idx on mns_ar_move_record(to_arrive_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX; create index ar_mvrc_fm_arr_pos_anchor_idx on mns_ar_move_record(fm_arrive_pos_anchor) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

create spatial index ar_mvrc_to_arr_pos_anchor_idx on mns_ar_move_record(to_arrive_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) ); create spatial index ar_mvrc_fm_arr_pos_anchor_idx on mns_ar_move_record(fm_arrive_pos_anchor) with ( bounding_box = ( 0, 0, 1000000, 1000000 ) );

property.name: arMvrcMoveKind
property.meta: Move Kind (load/disch/receive, etc.).

property.name: arMvrcUnitId

property.name: arMvrcUnitCategory
property.meta: Unit category (IMPORT/EXPORT/...)

property.name: arMvrcCtrNominalLength

property.meta: If TRUE, this record should be excluded from reporting.

property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.name: arPosSlot
property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: arPosOrientation

property.name: arPosName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.meta: xyz anchor point in bin's coordinate system.

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees
property.meta: Orientation in degrees in bin's coordinate system.

property.meta: An Enum giving the type of position

property.meta: A String giving the Id of the location: either a yard code, or carrier visit Id

property.name: arPosLocGkey

property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: arPosTier
property.meta: An integer specifying the tier for this Position.

property.name: arPosAnchor

property.name: arPosOrientationDegrees

property.name: arMvrcDistToStart
property.meta: Distance prime mover travelled in fetch phase, meters. SPARCS getHistoryDistToStart()

property.name: arMvrcDistOfCarry
property.meta: Distance prime mover travelled in carry phase, meters. SPARCS getHistoryDistOfCarry()

property.name: arMvrcTimeCarryComplete
property.meta: Time at which carry phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryCarryCompl()

property.name: arMvrcTimeDispatch
property.meta: Time at which move was dispatched. SPARCS getHistoryDispatchTime()

property.name: arMvrcTimeFetch
property.meta: Time at which fetch phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryFetchTime()

property.name: arMvrcTimeDischarge
property.meta: Time at which discharge phase was completed

property.name: arMvrcTimePut
property.meta: Time at which put phase was completed. SPARCS getHistoryPutTime()

property.name: arMvrcTimeCarryCheFetchReady
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was ready to fetch. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryCheFetchReadyTime

property.name: arMvrcTimeCarryChePutReady
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was ready to put. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryChePutReadyTime

property.name: arMvrcTimeCarryCheDispatch
property.meta: Time at which the carry CHE was dispatched. SPARCS 3.4: kWITagHistoryCarryCheDispatchTime

property.name: arMvrcTimeCarryCheStart
property.meta: Time at which carry phase is started.

property.name: arMvrcRehandleCount
property.meta: Number of rehandles required to perform the move. SPARCS getHistoryRhndlCount()

property.name: arMvrcTwinFetch
property.meta: True if we the Fetch phase was a twin move

property.name: arMvrcTwinPut
property.meta: True if the Put phase was a twin move

property.name: arMvrcRestowAccount
property.meta: Account to charge restow cost against. SPARCS getRestowAccount()

property.name: arMvrcRestowFlag
property.meta: Type of Restow action.

property.name: arMvrcServiceOrder
property.meta: The service order against which this move is to be charged

property.name: arMvrcRestowReason
property.meta: Reason for restow. SPARCS getRestowReason()

property.name: arMvrcFreightKind
property.meta: Freight Kind (MTY/FCL/.. etc).

property.name: arMvrcIsLiveReefer
property.meta: A flag that specifies if the container is a live refrigerated container or not.

property.name: arMvrcPow
property.meta: TODO : Get this clarified.

property.name: arMvrcTripId
property.meta: Unique Id for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.meta: Total laden distance for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.name: arMvrcTripDistUnladen
property.meta: Total unladen distance for the trip to which this move belongs.

property.name: arMvrcUpdateTime
property.meta: UTC timestamp at which this record was updated.

property.meta: Tare weight in pounds

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveCarrierStatistics

property.name: arCsCarrierGkey
property.meta: Gkey of the carrier e.g. "President Madison".

property.name: arCsVisitPhase
property.meta: Visit phase (CREATED, INBOUND ARRIVED, ...)

property.meta: A String that represents the name of the carrier e.g. "President Madison".

property.name: arCsCarrierRef
property.meta: Unique reference id for this carrier

property.name: arCsLineOperator
property.meta: Line operator

property.name: arCsServiceCode
property.meta: Service code for the carrier, e.g. "PSX".

property.name: arCsETA
property.meta: Estimated Time of Arrival for this carrier.

property.name: arCsETD
property.meta: Estimated time of departure for this carrier.

property.name: arCsATA
property.meta: Actual Time of Arrival for this carrier.

property.name: arCsATD
property.meta: Actual time of departure for this carrier.

property.name: arCsEstimatedCompletionTime

property.name: arCsPlannedCompletionTime
property.meta: Planned time of completion for the carrier.

property.name: arCsMovesToGo
property.meta: Number of moves to go for this carrier.

property.name: arCsCraneCount
property.meta: Number of cranes working for this carrier.

property.name: arCsUpdateTime

property.name: arCsMovesCompleted
property.meta: Number of moves completed for this carrier

property.name: arCsFirstMoveTime

property.name: arCsLastMoveTime
property.meta: Last move time for the carrier.

property.name: arCsFirstActivityTime
property.meta: First activity time for the carrier.

property.name: arCsLastActivityTime
property.meta: Last activity time for the carrier.

property.name: arCsTerminalDelay
property.meta: Terminal delay for the carrier.

property.name: arCsNonTerminalDelay
property.meta: Non terminal delay for the carrier.

property.name: arCsForceMajeureDelay
property.meta: Force Majeure delay for the carrier.

property.name: arCsTotalDelay
property.meta: Total delay for the carrier.

property.name: arCsGrossGangHour
property.meta: Gross gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: arCsNetGangHour
property.meta: Net gang hour for the carrier.

property.name: arCsAllMovesProductivity
property.meta: All Moves Productivity for the carrier.

property.name: arCsCraneDensity
property.meta: Crane Density for the carrier.

property.name: arCsCraneSplit
property.meta: Crane Split for the carrier.

property.name: arCsMovesLastHour

property.name: arCsEffectiveGrossGangHour

property.name: arCsEffectiveNetGangHour

property.meta: A String giving the coordinates of the Position within its Location

property.name: posOrientation
property.meta: A String defining the orientation of the Unit within this Position

property.name: posName
property.meta: A String formatted for the user that represents the position

property.name: arCmsPickDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which request was dispatched to pick the unit for this che move

property.name: arCmsPickArriveTime
property.meta: Time at which che arrives to pick the unit for this che move

property.name: arCmsLiftDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which straddle is dispatched to lift a container, applicable for PR

property.name: arCmsContainerOnTime
property.meta: Time at which container is put on the che

property.name: arCmsDropDispatchTime
property.meta: Time at which request to drop the container is dispatched for the given che

property.name: arCmsDropArriveTime
property.meta: Time at which che arrives to drop the container

property.name: arCmsContainerOffTime
property.meta: Time at which container is taken off from the che

property.name: arCmsPickIdleTime
property.meta: Time elapsed for a che until it received the dispatch request to pick a container

property.name: arCmsPickWaitTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to pick the cntr and the time when the cntr is on the che

property.name: arCmsDropIdleTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to pick the cntr and the time when the cntr is on the che

property.name: arCmsDropWaitTime
property.meta: Time diff between the time the che arrives to drop the cntr and the time when it drops the cntr from the che

property.name: arCmsRehandleCount
property.meta: Number of rehandles required to perform the che move.

property.name: arCmsTwinMove
property.meta: True if this was a twin move

property.name: arCmsLaneChange
property.meta: True if RTG changed lanes in order to perform this move

property.name: arCmsPickDistance
property.meta: Total distance travelled by CHE to pick up the container associated with this che move.

property.name: arCmsDropDistance
property.meta: Total distance travelled by CHE to drop the container associated with this che move.

property.name: arCmsMoveDirection
property.meta: Direction of the move (from TZ, to TZ etc).

property.name: arCmsMoveCategory
property.meta: Category of the move (WS In, Preposition etc). Not used, Refer to cmsMovePurpose (move_purpose)

property.name: arCmsFromBlock
property.meta: Yard block from which the move is made

property.name: arCmsFromBlockType
property.meta: Yard block type from which the move is made

property.name: arCmsToBlock
property.meta: Yard block to which the move is made

property.name: arCmsToBlockType
property.meta: Yard block type to which the move is made

property.name: arCmsWaitTimeAtQC
property.meta: Wait time at QC (in ms)

property.name: arCmsWaitTimeAtBlock
property.meta: Wait time at block (in ms)

property.name: arCmsMovePurpose
property.meta: Category of the move (Transfer In, Transfer Out, Preposition etc).

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveCheOperatorStatistics
class.meta: Holds statistical information about individual CHE operator

property.name: arCosCheId
property.meta: Id of the Che

property.name: arCosCheShortName
property.meta: Name of the Che

property.name: arCosCheOpMode
property.meta: Operating mode of the che

property.name: arCosChePow
property.meta: Pow of the che

property.name: arCosChePool
property.meta: Pool of the che

property.name: arCosCheType
property.meta: Type of the che

property.name: arCosCheOperatorGkey
property.meta: Gkey of Operator of this che

property.name: arCosCheOperatorId
property.meta: Id of Operator of this che

property.name: arCosCheOperatorName
property.meta: Name of Operator of this che

property.name: arCosOperatorAction
property.meta: che operator action (login/logout/available.. etc.).

property.name: arCosActionTime
property.meta: Time at which operator action takes place

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveCheSession
class.meta: Holds information about individual CHE sessions for a CHE operator

property.name: arCsesCheId
property.meta: Id of the Che

property.name: arCsesCheShortName
property.meta: Name of the Che

property.name: arCsesCheOpMode
property.meta: Operating mode of the che

property.name: arCsesChePow
property.meta: Pow of the che

property.name: arCsesChePool
property.meta: Pool of the che

property.name: arCsesCheType
property.meta: Type of the che

property.name: arCsesCheOperatorGkey
property.meta: Gkey of Operator of this che

property.name: arCsesCheOperatorId
property.meta: Id of Operator of this che

property.name: arCsesCheOperatorName
property.meta: Name of Operator of this che

property.name: arCsesLoginTime
property.meta: Time at which operator logins to the corresponding CHE

property.name: arCsesLogoutTime
property.meta: Time at which operator logs out from the corresponding CHE

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveCheSessionPeriod
class.meta: Holds information about periods within the CHE session such as AVAILABILITY, BREAK etc.

property.name: arCspCheSessionGkey
property.meta: >Gkey for the che session.

property.name: arCspStartTime
property.meta: Time at which period started

property.name: arCspEndTime
property.meta: Time at which period ended

property.name: arCspDuration
property.meta: Time duration for this period.

property.name: arCspPeriodType
property.meta: Che Session Periods (AVAILABILITY/BREAK/ etc..).

class.name: com.navis.mensa.business.mensa.ArchiveEquipmentBlockVisit
class.meta: Holds information about equipment block visit details

property.name: arEbvYard
property.meta: The Yard to which this equipment belongs

property.name: arEbvBlock
property.meta: Block ID

property.name: arEbvCms
property.meta: Reference to CheMoveStatistics

property.name: arEbvEquipment
property.meta: Equipment ID

property.name: arEbvTimeIn
property.meta: Time at which equipment enters block

property.name: arEbvTimeOut
property.meta: Time at which equipment exits block

property.name: arEbvMoveCount
property.meta: No. of moves done between the time the equipment enters and exits the block

property.name: arEbvCheMoveDirection
property.meta: Time at which equipment exits block
